channel.title: Wont let me change the max stat -.-

item.title: Wont let me change the max stat -.-
item.dc:creator: @zz_whip_zz zz_whip_zz
item.description:
@zz_whip_zz wrote:

[code]
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor(
(double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return ###;
}[code]

i think thats it and replace ### with number of skill you want.[/code][/code]
and its in client.java for max level change

item.source: Wont let me change the max stat -.-

item.title: Wont let me change the max stat -.-
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

Hello, AGAIN, i know how to change the max stat but when i do, it still goes to 100 and no further… I have the code that i got in my player.java (which i know is where you change the max stat) (there might be more that i gotta change but this is all the people were saying a while back…) Here’s the code i got in my player.java that SAYS 99 but still goes to 100 for some reason… CODE:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) return lvl; }

I know that im probably missing something so please tell me if i am because i’ll currently adding a code that requires 99 in a stat and if your like 100 it wont work… so yea.

Thank you,
-Zaron
